summary: Adds three spells to the game : one to transform foes into ice, one to push and one to make the time going faster.
descriptionHtml:
Adds three new shout-inspired spells to the game :
- Ice Form sends an icy spear that transforms your target into a block of ice for 5 seconds.
- Force Push is a lesser powerful version of the Unrelenting Force
- Fast Motion makes the time go faster for 10 seconds.

WARNING : Do not use Fast Motion while in combat, or your foes will attack you fast as hell and you\'ll probably die.

The three spell tomes can be found on Farengar\'s Desk in Dragonsreach.
author: Nisagi
